text: Michał Grabowski Michał Grabowski, born 25 September 1804 in Złotyjów, Volhynia, died 19 November 1863 in Warsaw, was a Polish author. Grabowski was a director of the "education commission" in Warzaw. == References == * Category:1804 births Category:1863 deaths Category:Polish-language writers
title: Michal Grabowski (author)
